tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LegalContracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contract_content TEXT,
    contract_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Contracts (contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_name VARCHAR(255),
  contract_content TEXT,
  contract_hash VARCHAR(64),
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  blockchain_id INT);

CREATE TABLE Signatures (signature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id INT,
  party_name VARCHAR(255),
  signature_hash VARCHAR(64),
  signed_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE Verifications (verification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  contract_id INT,
  verifier_name VARCHAR(255),
  is_verified BOOLEAN,
  verified_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE signatures (
    signature_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID NOT NULL,
    party_id UUID NOT NULL,
    signed_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    signature CHAR(128) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES contracts(contract_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (party_id) REFERENCES parties(party_id)
);

CREATE TABLE verification (
    verification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID NOT NULL,
    verified_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    verified BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    verifier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    remarks TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_hash VARCHAR(255),
    creator_id UUID,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    contract_text TEXT
)
